name: Cheese Game (itch) (ETGgames)
description:
Collect all the dice from the rats to win the level!

Use Left/Right arrow to rotate the Cheese Planet and move the dice!

To collect a dice from a rat, the number on your dice must match the number on the rat's dice. Otherwise that dice dies.

Rotating the Cheese Planet also cycles through the dice number, so you can match it up.

You lose and restart the level once all your dice have died.

(Mobile controls: press left/right side of screen)
